member.name: T:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationDescription
member.summary: Exposes a collection of individual animation effects that are performed on a specific target to make up a complete Windows opacity, scaling, or translation animation.

member.name: M:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationDescription.#ctor(Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect,Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget)
member.summary: Creates an AnimationDescription object with a specific animation and target.
member.param: The animation effect to apply to the target.
The target of the animation effect.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationDescription.Animations
member.summary: Gets the collection of animations that are associated with the AnimationDescription object.
member.returns: A collection of IPropertyAnimation instances, each of which represents an animation effect specified for this AnimationDescription object.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationDescription.DelayLimit
member.summary: Gets the maximum cumulative delay time for the animation to be applied to the collection of objects in a target.
member.returns: The delay limit time, expressed in 100-nanosecond units.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationDescription.StaggerDelay
member.summary: Gets the amount of time between the application of the animation effect to each object in a target that contains multiple objects. The StaggerDelay, together with the StaggerDelayFactor and DelayLimit, is one of the three elements used to control the relative timing of the animation effects.
member.returns: The stagger delay time, expressed in 100-nanosecond units.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationDescription.StaggerDelayFactor
member.summary: Gets a multiplier that is applied to each occurrence of the stagger delay, increasing or decreasing the previous delay instance by that amount.
member.returns: The factor to apply to the stagger delay.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationDescription.ZOrder
member.summary: Gets the z-order position of an AnimationDescription object relative to other AnimationDescription objects in the same animation effect. AnimationDescription objects with a higher z-order cover transitions with a lower z-order.
member.returns: The z-order value.

member.name: T:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect
member.summary: Specifies an animation.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.AddToGrid
member.summary: An object is added to a collection that is arranged in a grid.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.AddToList
member.summary: An object is added to a list.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.AddToSearchGrid
member.summary: An object is added to search results that are arranged in a grid.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.AddToSearchList
member.summary: An object is added to a vertically arranged list of search results.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.Collapse
member.summary: An object decreases in size to hide content.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.CrossFade
member.summary: One item is faded out as another fades in its place.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.DeleteFromGrid
member.summary: An object is removed from a collection that is arranged in a grid.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.DeleteFromList
member.summary: An object is removed from a list.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.DeleteFromSearchGrid
member.summary: An object is removed from search results that are arranged in a grid.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.DeleteFromSearchList
member.summary: An object is removed from a vertically arranged list of search results.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.DragBetweenEnter
member.summary: A drag source has moved between two items.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.DragBetweenLeave
member.summary: A drag source is no longer between two items.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.DragSourceEnd
member.summary: The user has stopped dragging an item.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.DragSourceStart
member.summary: The user has begun dragging an item.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.EnterPage
member.summary: A page of content is brought in to the display.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.Expand
member.summary: <!--Wherever possible, change passive voice to active in the descriptions below.-->

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.FadeIn
member.summary: A contextual control fades in.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.FadeOut
member.summary: A contextual control fades out.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.Hide
member.summary: UI collapses around a tapped or clicked target.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.HideEdgeUI
member.summary: UI displayed at the edge of the screen is removed.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.HidePanel
member.summary: A section of content is removed from the screen.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.HidePopup
member.summary: A pop-up control is removed from the screen.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.Peek
member.summary: Contents of a tile move up or down to show a part of the tile that is normally hidden.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.PointerDown
member.summary: The pointing device (such as a mouse or touch) has engaged on an item.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.PointerUp
member.summary: The pointing device (such as a mouse or touch) has disengaged from an item.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.Reposition
member.summary: An object changes position. No more specific animation applies.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.Reveal
member.summary: UI expands around a tapped or clicked target.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.ShowEdgeUI
member.summary: UI is brought in from the edge of the screen.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.ShowPanel
member.summary: A section of content appears on the screen.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.ShowPopup
member.summary: A pop-up control appears on the screen.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.SwipeDeselect
member.summary: An object has been deselected through the swipe interaction.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.SwipeReveal
member.summary: Triggered by a press and hold on an item that can be cross-slide selected.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.SwipeSelect
member.summary: An object has been selected through the swipe interaction.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.TransitionContent
member.summary: Large-scale content replacement is occurring.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.TransitionPage
member.summary: One page is replaced by another page.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffect.UpdateBadge
member.summary: Update a tile's badge overlay.

member.name: T:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget
member.summary: Specifies a participant in an animation.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Added
member.summary: Objects that are being added.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Affected
member.summary: Objects affected by the animation, such as objects that move out of the way when another object is dropped between them.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Background
member.summary: The background object of the item.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Content
member.summary: The content of the item.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Deleted
member.summary: Objects that are being deleted.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Deselected
member.summary: Objects that have been deselected through a cross-slide deselect interaction.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.DragSource
member.summary: Objects that are being dragged.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Hidden
member.summary: Objects that are currently hidden.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Incoming
member.summary: New content to replace old content.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Outgoing
member.summary: Old content that is being replaced by new content.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Outline
member.summary: An outline border around an area.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Primary
member.summary: The only participant in an single-target animation.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Remaining
member.summary: Objects that are left behind after other items have been removed.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Revealed
member.summary: Objects that become visible in an expansion.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.RowIn
member.summary: A row that is being added to a grid.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.RowOut
member.summary: A row that is about to be removed from a grid.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Selected
member.summary: Objects that are selected through a cross-slide select interaction.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Selection
member.summary: Objects, such as checkmarks, that indicate that an item is selected.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Shown
member.summary: Objects previously invisible that are becoming visible.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.AnimationEffectTarget.Tapped
member.summary: Objects that have been tapped or clicked on.

member.name: T:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.IPropertyAnimation
member.summary: Describes properties of animations that are common to all animation effects.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.IPropertyAnimation.Control1
member.summary: Gets the location of the first control point for the cubic Bézier curve that describes how this property of this object should animate over time.
member.returns: The location of the control point.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.IPropertyAnimation.Control2
member.summary: Gets the location of the second control point for the cubic Bézier curve that describes how this property of this object should animate over time.
member.returns: The location of the control point.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.IPropertyAnimation.Delay
member.summary: Gets the amount of time between when the animation is instructed to begin and when that animation actually begins to draw.
member.returns: The amount of time to delay before starting an animation.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.IPropertyAnimation.Duration
member.summary: Gets the amount of time over which the animation should be performed. This does not include the delay.
member.returns: The duration of the animation.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.IPropertyAnimation.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of animation represented by this object.
member.returns: One of the animation type values.

member.name: T:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.OpacityAnimation
member.summary: Provides methods that enable you to retrieve the parameters of an opacity (fade in or fade out) animation.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.OpacityAnimation.Control1
member.summary: Gets the location of the first control point for the cubic Bézier curve that describes how the opacity should animate over time.
member.returns: The location of the control point.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.OpacityAnimation.Control2
member.summary: Gets the location of the second control point for the cubic Bézier curve that describes how the opacity should animate over time.
member.returns: The location of the control point.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.OpacityAnimation.Delay
member.summary: Gets the amount of time between when the opacity animation is instructed to begin and when that animation actually begins to draw.
member.returns: The amount of time to delay before starting the opacity animation.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.OpacityAnimation.Duration
member.summary: Gets the amount of time over which the opacity animation should be performed. This does not include the delay.
member.returns: The duration of the animation.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.OpacityAnimation.FinalOpacity
member.summary: Gets the object's final opacity.
member.returns: The final opacity. A value of 0.0 represents full transparency and a value of 1.0 represents full opacity.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.OpacityAnimation.InitialOpacity
member.summary: Gets the object's initial opacity.
member.returns: The initial opacity, if any. A value of 0.0 represents full transparency and a value of 1.0 represents full opacity.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.OpacityAnimation.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of animation represented by this object.
member.returns: One of the animation type values.

member.name: T:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.PropertyAnimation
member.summary: Provides methods that enable you to retrieve animation property values that are common to all property animation types.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.PropertyAnimation.Control1
member.summary: Gets the location of the first control point for the cubic Bézier curve that describes how this property of this object should animate over time.
member.returns: The location of the control point.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.PropertyAnimation.Control2
member.summary: Gets the location of the second control point for the cubic Bézier curve that describes how this property of this object should animate over time.
member.returns: The location of the control point.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.PropertyAnimation.Delay
member.summary: Gets the amount of time between when the animation is instructed to begin and when that animation actually begins to draw.
member.returns: The amount of time to delay before starting an animation.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.PropertyAnimation.Duration
member.summary: Gets the amount of time over which the animation should be performed. This does not include the delay.
member.returns: The duration of the animation.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.PropertyAnimation.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of animation represented by this object.
member.returns: One of the animation type values.

member.name: T:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.PropertyAnimationType
member.summary: Specifies the animation type represented by a PropertyAnimation object.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.PropertyAnimationType.Opacity
member.summary: Animate the object's transparency. The corresponding object is the OpacityAnimation.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.PropertyAnimationType.Scale
member.summary: Animate the size of the object, magnifying or shrinking. The corresponding object is the ScaleAnimation.

member.name: F:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.PropertyAnimationType.Translation
member.summary: Move the object. The corresponding object is the TranslationAnimation.

member.name: T:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.ScaleAnimation
member.summary: Provides methods that enable you to retrieve the parameters for a scaling (growing or shrinking) animation.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.ScaleAnimation.Control1
member.summary: Gets the location of the first control point for the cubic Bézier curve that describes how the scale should animate over time.
member.returns: The location of the control point.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.ScaleAnimation.Control2
member.summary: Gets the location of the second control point for the cubic Bézier curve that describes how the scale should animate over time.
member.returns: The location of the control point.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.ScaleAnimation.Delay
member.summary: Gets the amount of time between when the scale animation is instructed to begin and when that animation actually begins to draw.
member.returns: The amount of time to delay before starting the scaling animation.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.ScaleAnimation.Duration
member.summary: Gets the amount of time over which the scale animation should be performed. This does not include the delay.
member.returns: The duration of the animation.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.ScaleAnimation.FinalScaleX
member.summary: Gets the final horizontal scale factor for the object.
member.returns: The final horizontal scale factor by which to multiply the value.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.ScaleAnimation.FinalScaleY
member.summary: Gets the final vertical scale factor for the object.
member.returns: The final vertical scale factor by which to multiply the value.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.ScaleAnimation.InitialScaleX
member.summary: Gets the initial horizontal scale factor for the object.
member.returns: The initial horizontal scale factor, if any, by which to multiply the value.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.ScaleAnimation.InitialScaleY
member.summary: Gets the initial vertical scale factor for the object.
member.returns: The initial vertical scale factor, if any, by which to multiply the value.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.ScaleAnimation.NormalizedOrigin
member.summary: Gets the center point for the scaling animation, expressed as a point relative to the object's normal size.
member.returns: The normalized center point.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.ScaleAnimation.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of animation represented by this object.
member.returns: One of the animation type values.

member.name: T:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.TranslationAnimation
member.summary: Provides methods that enable you to retrieve the parameters for a translation (move to a new location) animation.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.TranslationAnimation.Control1
member.summary: Gets the location of the first control point for the cubic Bézier curve that describes how the translation should animate over time.
member.returns: The location of the control point.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.TranslationAnimation.Control2
member.summary: Gets the location of the second control point for the cubic Bézier curve that describes how the translation should animate over time.
member.returns: The location of the control point.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.TranslationAnimation.Delay
member.summary: Gets the amount of time between when the translation animation is instructed to begin and when that animation actually begins to draw.
member.returns: The amount of time to delay before starting the translation animation.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.TranslationAnimation.Duration
member.summary: Gets the amount of time over which the translation animation should be performed. This does not include the delay.
member.returns: The duration of the animation.

member.name: P:Windows.UI.Core.AnimationMetrics.TranslationAnimation.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of animation represented by this object.
member.returns: One of the animation type values.
